coin.description: An uppercase string code representation of a particular trading pair or instrument. This is usually written as BaseCurrency/QuoteCurrency with a slash as in BTC/USD, LTC/CNY or ETH/EUR, etc. Symbols are used to reference markets within the ccxt library.

interval.description: Interval between each ticker data point.

period.description: Period of time that specifies the time interval to be used when fetching data: [period, currentTime]. Possible values are: [d, mo, y, max]

portfolio_size.description: Initial amount of money (USD) to be used by the trading agent.

DCA_interval.description: Interval between each DCA (Dollar Cost Averaging) investment (as value * ticker intervals).

BB_window.description: Window size for the Bollinger Bands indicator.

BB_std.description: Standard deviation for the Bollinger Bands indicator.
